General.Name: Zhangjiagang Haiguo New Energy Equipment Manufacturing Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhangjiagang Haiguo New Energy Equipment Manufacturing Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells special forgings for large and medium-sized equipment in China and internationally. The company's principal products include oil and gas equipment, wind power equipment, mechanical equipment, pressure vessel forgings, and other forgings. Its products are used in oil and gas exploration, wind power generation, mechanical equipment, ships, nuclear power and other fields. Zhangjiagang Haiguo New Energy Equipment Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.
